Class RUBTClient

java.lang.Object
  RUBTClient

public class RUBTClient
extends java.lang.Object

The main RUBTClient interface. For phase 1, The client does the following:

  • 1) Parses the torrent file.
  • 2) Contacts the tracker.
  • 3) Retrieves the peer list.
  • 4) Performs handshake with the assigned peer
  • 5) On success downloads data from peer
  • 6) Mission Completed

Author:
Harshil Shah, Ted Nohh
